title: Use Your Inside Hands
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, Assante teaches us about black slang and culture within American Sign Language. 

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio, video and BTS images) and Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast
